block.p: Jessica Morrison Colvin, the daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Robert B. Colvin of Cambridge, Mass., was married there yesterday to Andrew Pillion Boer, the son of Dr. and Mrs. F. Peter Boer of Village of Golf, Fla., and Greenwich, Conn. The Rev. Stephen Kendrick performed the ceremony at Christ Episcopal Church.

Mr. and Mrs. Boer graduated from Princeton University and work in San Francisco. The bride, 28, is a financial analyst at Gap, the retail clothing chain. The bridegroom, 29, is the vice president for sales and marketing for BridgePath, a provider of Internet software to employment firms.

Jessica Morrison Colvin, the daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Robert B. Colvin of Cambridge, Mass., was married there yesterday to Andrew Pillion Boer, the son of Dr. and Mrs. F. Peter Boer of Village of Golf, Fla., and Greenwich, Conn. The Rev. Stephen Kendrick performed the ceremony at Christ Episcopal Church.

Mr. and Mrs. Boer graduated from Princeton University and work in San Francisco. The bride, 28, is a financial analyst at Gap, the retail clothing chain. The bridegroom, 29, is the vice president for sales and marketing for BridgePath, a provider of Internet software to employment firms.

The bride received an M.B.A. degree from Harvard University. Her father is the chief of the pathology department at Massachusetts General Hospital and a professor of pathology at the Harvard Medical School, both in Boston. Her mother, Gatewood Colvin, is an investment representative in Cambridge with BankBoston Investor Services, a unit of FleetBoston Bank.

Mr. Boer was until last year the chief executive of Accept.com, a credit-card acceptance service that he founded for Internet auction sellers and which was later sold to Amazon.com. He received a law degree from the University of Michigan at Ann Arbor. His father retired as an executive vice president and the chief technical officer of W. R. Grace in Boca Raton, Fla. He is now the John J. Lee adjunct professor of chemical engineering at Yale in New Haven and the chief executive of Tiger Scientific, a consulting business in Boynton Beach, Fla. The bridegroom's mother, Ellen Boer, is a lawyer in private practice in Greenwich.
